sections.MISSION:
2PLT, K TRP 3/2CR conducts M4 Zero and Qualification on Ranges 124 and 126 on 01AUG24 ISO USAREUR-AF Best Squad Competition.

sections.KEY TASKS:
All personnel accurately group and zero their weapon systems.
All personnel complete table VI of the M4 qualification.
All teams are briefed on the movement route to RNG 122
All teams are checked for brass and ammo before movement to RNG 122
No safety incidents occur.
sections.END STATE:
All USAEUR-AF Best Squad Competition teams successfully group and zero their weapons systems and complete table VI of the M4 qualification. All teams are thoroughly briefed and understand the movement route to RNG 122 IOT continue the competition.
